short_summary: Purchase and Installation of Office Furniture
description: The Department of Justice Canada requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture for Category 6 under SA # E60PQ-140003.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Solicitation Number:** 31256
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01011411
**Title:** Purchase and Installation of Office Furniture for Department of Justice Canada

**About This Tender**
The Department of Justice Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to support the needs of the Department.

**Contract Requirements**

* **Estimated Quantity:** 7 chairs, tables, and other furniture items
* **Deployment Location:** Ottawa, Ontario
* **Delivery and Installation:** by January 31, 2023
* **contract Term:** from Contract Award to March 31, 2023

**Contracting Entity**
The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Justice Canada. The contact information is as follows:
* Name: Erin Butler
* Email: [erin.butler@justice.gc.ca](mailto:erin.butler@justice.gc.ca)
* Phone: 306-716-5510

**Notice Details**

* **Publish Date:** October 27, 2022
* **Closing Date and Time:** November 8, 2022, 4:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Amendment Date:** November 3, 2022
* **Current Tender Status:** Expired

**Required Solicitation Documents**
To download the solicitation documents, including the RFP and Query and Clarification (Q&A) responses, please refer to the following links:
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/27/12abbcb1e814eb894261409e33f926e3/1000031256_npp_eng.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/27/8f61f281ad8044eb5d7ec3b3941beb2a/1000031256_rfb_eng.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/ad440518426bb83713af5b17fe6ee407/1000031256_qa_eng.pdf

**Important Information**

* This tender follows the selection of trade agreements. Suppliers must be Canadian-owned and operated to be eligible for this project.
* This tender follows the specified procurement methodology, namely competitive, Selective tendering
